title: Miami Folk-Artist Gets A Homecoming
teaser: A new exhibit featuring the work of the late Miami outsider artist Purvis Young is resurrecting the neighborhood he used as his canvass.
contentencoded:
A self-taught artist who died four years ago is getting something of a resurrection in the Miami neighborhood that he used as his canvass.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, WLRN‘s Wilson Sayre reports on a new exhibit featuring the works of the late Purvis Young.

  • WLRN: On Scrap Wood, Broken Doors And Shag Carpets, Purvis Young Painted Overtown

Reporter

  • Wilson Sayre, reporter for WLRN in Miami. She tweets @WilsonSayre.
